_sText:
This is a whole new kind of game! MG_MK stands for mini-game mortal kombat!

MK will be the new favourite mod/game-type for all fun servers!



Objective:
Punch enemies into traps, monsters, fire, bombs and other deadly stuff!

Controls:
LMB: punch forward
RMB: uppercut


It's a fast pace adrenaline rush, with laughs guaranteed!



Mg_mk_colosseum_x is the first in a line of upcoming MK maps! Two teams fight off in a deadly arena filled with traps. Punch your foe into one of the many spiked walls, punch em into a large fire and see them burn to death. Or perhaps you want to let a giant dune shark or antguard do your dirty work for you. MADNESS? THIS... IS... SPAAARTAAAA!


music is not my own:
Matrix Reloaded - High Way Chase Theme
Inception - Main Theme
Sparta quote: 300


If you want prefabs, PM me on this forum:
http://forum.i3d.net/cs-source-work-progress/120708-fight-map-3.html
